name: fullstack-helsinki-phonebook
description: Phonebook backend for the Full stack open 2020 course

scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../backend
scripts.build:ui-dev: NODE_ENV=dev rm -rf build && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build-dev --prod && cp -r build ../backend

author: Diego J.
